extendedInfo.description: As Commanding General of the CityVille S.O.S. Forceâ¢, you must stop the evil Dr. Mayhemâ¢ and his minions from conquering your city, and the world!Construct automatic defenses AND personally control your powerful KREONâ¢ soldiers in this mind-blowing game of tower-defense and live-action battle. As you play you can build cooler and more powerful defenses and upgrade your soldiers' skills, weapons and armor!KRE-O CityVille Invasion features eyeball-popping 3D graphics. Can you make your city powerful enough to defeat Dr. Mayhem's mighty army? You'd better - the world's counting on you!BONUS ITEMSUnlock cool bonus items with codes you get in KRE-Oâ¢ CityVilleâ¢ Invasionâ¢ construction sets.FEATURESâ¢ 5 Unique Combat Mapsâ¢ 15 Powerful Weaponsâ¢ 35 Characters to Play, Each with Unique and Upgradeable Hats and Suitsâ¢ 25 Story Missions, Plus Over 400 Replayable Challenges to Completeâ¢ 13 Types of Buildings to Construct and Defendâ¢ 5 Mighty Defense TurretsUse of this application is governed by the KREO CityVille Invasion Terms of Service. Collection and use of data are subject to the KREO CityVille Invasion Privacy Policy. The KREO CityVille Invasion Terms of Service is located at http://company.zynga.com/KCVI/terms-of-service. The KREO CityVille Invasion Privacy Policy is available in the Privacy Policy field located in the Developer section below and available at http://company.zynga.com/KCVI/policy.
